attributes.action: Extend the opening times of Pubs/Clubs in England.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK public will not disperse back into their households at 10pm. The government will be faced with tougher policing and more fines for house parties and illegal raves. 

The government could monitor and control people easier in socially distanced, safe venues.
attributes.background: Extend the opening hours pubs in England. Possible further extension on weekends.
